Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Enums
  • Annotation Types
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    io.helidon.common.http.Content
    use io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReadableContent instead
    io.helidon.common.http.ContextualRegistry
    This class will be replaced with Context in future Helidon versions
    io.helidon.common.http.Reader
    use io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReader instead
    io.helidon.security.providers.httpauth.UserStore
    This store is designed for POC - e.g. no need for better security. You can use SecureUserStore instead.
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    io.helidon.dbclient.webserver.jsonp.DbResultSupport
    This class is a hack to work around insufficient support for stream of objects in WebServer - the update to WebServer is in progress. This module will be removed.
    io.helidon.grpc.server.TracingConfiguration
    use GrpcTracingConfig
    io.helidon.grpc.server.TracingConfiguration.Builder
    use GrpcTracingConfig.builder() instead
    io.helidon.integrations.cdi.eclipselink.CDISEPlatformExtension
    Only a CDI container should instantiate this class.
    io.helidon.media.common.ContentTypeCharset
    use MessageBodyContext.charset() instead
    io.helidon.media.jackson.server.JacksonSupport
    use JacksonSupport with WebServer.Builder.addMediaSupport(MediaSupport)
    io.helidon.media.jsonb.server.JsonBindingSupport
    use JsonbSupport with WebServer.Builder.addMediaSupport(MediaSupport)
    io.helidon.media.jsonp.server.JsonSupport
    use JsonpSupport with WebServer.Builder.addMediaSupport(MediaSupport)
    io.helidon.microprofile.metrics.MetricUtil.LookupResult
    This class is made public to migrate from metrics1 to metrics2 for gRPC, this should be refactored
    io.helidon.microprofile.server.Main
    use Main instead
    io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.ClientSecurityFeature
    replaced with io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.client.ClientSecurity for constants the feature is no longer needed to configure security
    io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.ClientSecurityFilter
    This class should not be used directly anyway, yet if you needed it, it is available in the new helidon-security-integration-jersey-client module.
    io.helidon.webclient.FileSubscriber
    This will most likely be removed when multipart is implemented.
    io.helidon.webserver.WebServerLogFormatter
  • Enums 
    Enum Description
    io.helidon.microprofile.metrics.MetricUtil.MatchingType
    This class is made public to migrate from metrics1 to metrics2 for gRPC, this should be refactored
  • Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.SecureClient
    Use the new module helidon-security-integration-jersey-client that adds security support without coding
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.ClientSecurityFeature.PROPERTY_CONTEXT
    use ClientSecurity constants instead
    io.helidon.security.integration.jersey.ClientSecurityFeature.PROPERTY_PROVIDER
    use ClientSecurity constants instead
    io.helidon.webserver.jersey.JerseySupport.REQUEST_SPAN_QUALIFIER
    Use span context (JerseySupport.REQUEST_SPAN_CONTEXT) instead.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    io.helidon.common.configurable.Resource.create​(Config, String)
    use Resource.create(io.helidon.config.Config) instead (and change the configuration to use .resource.type instead of prefixes
    io.helidon.common.http.Content.registerFilter​(Function<Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReaderContext.registerFilter
    io.helidon.common.http.Content.registerReader​(Class<T>, Reader<T>)
    use io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReaderContext.registerReader
    io.helidon.common.http.ContextualRegistry.builder()
    used for backward compatibility only
    io.helidon.common.http.ContextualRegistry.create()
    use Context.create()
    io.helidon.config.ConfigMappers.toCalendar​(String)
    use new time API, such as ZonedDateTime
    io.helidon.config.ConfigMappers.toDate​(String)
    Use one of the time API classes, such as Instant or ZonedDateTime
    io.helidon.config.ConfigMappers.toGregorianCalendar​(String)
    use new time API, such as ZonedDateTime
    io.helidon.config.ConfigMappers.toSimpleTimeZone​(String)
    use new time API, such as ZoneId
    io.helidon.config.ConfigMappers.toTimeZone​(String)
    use new time API, such as ZoneId
    io.helidon.health.HealthSupport.Builder.add​(HealthCheck...)
    use HealthSupport.Builder.addReadiness(org.eclipse.microprofile.health.HealthCheck...) or HealthSupport.Builder.addLiveness(org.eclipse.microprofile.health.HealthCheck...) instead
    io.helidon.integrations.cdi.jpa.PersistenceUnitInfoBean.fromPersistence​(Persistence, ClassLoader, Supplier<? extends ClassLoader>, URL, Map<? extends String, ? extends Set<? extends Class<?>>>, PersistenceUnitInfoBean.DataSourceProvider)
    Please use the PersistenceUnitInfoBean.fromPersistenceUnit(PersistenceUnit, ClassLoader, Supplier, URL, Map, Supplier) method instead.
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyContext.registerFilter​(Function<Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use MessageBodyContext.registerFilter(MessageBodyFilter) instead
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReadableContent.registerFilter​(Function<Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReadableContent.registerReader​(Class<T>, Reader<T>)
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyReaderContext.registerReader​(Class<T>, Reader<T>)
    use MessageBodyReaderContext.registerReader(MessageBodyReader) instead
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyWriteableContent.registerFilter​(Function<Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use MessageBodyWriteableContent.registerFilter(MessageBodyFilter) instead
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyWriteableContent.registerWriter​(Class<T>, Function<T, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use MessageBodyWriteableContent.registerWriter(MessageBodyWriter) instead
    io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyWriterContext.registerWriter​(Class<T>, Function<T, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use MessageBodyWriterContext.registerWriter(MessageBodyWriter) instead
    io.helidon.metrics.MetricsSupport.Builder.context​(String)
    use MetricsSupport.Builder.webContext(String) instead, aligned with API of heatlh checks
    io.helidon.metrics.RegistryFactory.createSeFactory​(Config)
    use RegistryFactory.create() or RegistryFactory.create(io.helidon.config.Config) instead when a new registry factory instance is needed. Use RegistryFactory.getInstance() or RegistryFactory.getInstance(io.helidon.config.Config) to retrieve the shared (singleton) instance.
    io.helidon.metrics.RegistryFactory.getRegistryFactory()
    use RegistryFactory::getInstance instead.
    io.helidon.microprofile.health.HealthCheckProvider.healthChecks()
    in the new versions of MP Health, we use either HealthCheckProvider.readinessChecks() or HealthCheckProvider.livenessChecks()
    io.helidon.microprofile.metrics.MetricsCdiExtension.registerMetric​(E, Class<?>, MetricUtil.LookupResult<? extends Annotation>)
    This method is made public to migrate from metrics1 to metrics2 for gRPC, this should be refactored
    io.helidon.microprofile.metrics.MetricUtil.lookupAnnotation​(E, Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<?>)
    This method is made public to migrate from metrics1 to metrics2 for gRPC, this should be refactored
    io.helidon.microprofile.server.Main.serverPort()
    use ServerCdiExtension to get the port
    io.helidon.security.EndpointConfig.annotations​(EndpointConfig.AnnotationScope...)
    use iteration over security levels instead
    io.helidon.security.EndpointConfig.Builder.annotations​(EndpointConfig.AnnotationScope, Map<Class<? extends Annotation>, List<Annotation>>)
    Use the securityLevels method.
    io.helidon.security.EndpointConfig.combineAnnotations​(Class<T>, EndpointConfig.AnnotationScope...)
    use iteration over security levels instead
    io.helidon.security.SecurityRequest.tracingSpan()
    use SecurityRequest.tracingSpanContext() instead
    io.helidon.security.SecurityRequestBuilder.tracingSpan​(Span)
    to be removed in 2.0, now needed for backward compatibility
    io.helidon.tracing.jaeger.JaegerTracerBuilder.samplerMananger​(String)
    typo, please use JaegerTracerBuilder.samplerManager(String)
    io.helidon.tracing.TracerBuilder.buildAndRegister()
    Use TracerBuilder.registerGlobal(boolean) to control whether the resulting instance is registered as a GlobalTracer.
    io.helidon.webserver.ServerRequest.span()
    use ServerRequest.spanContext() instead
    io.helidon.webserver.ServerRequest.spanContext()
    this method will have a different return type in next backward incompatible version of Helidon. It will return Optional<SpanContext>. All methods that can return null will use Optional
    io.helidon.webserver.ServerResponse.registerFilter​(Function<Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use ServerResponse.registerFilter(io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyFilter) instead
    io.helidon.webserver.ServerResponse.registerWriter​(Class<T>, Function<T, Flow.Publisher<DataChunk>>)
    use ServerResponse.registerWriter(io.helidon.media.common.MessageBodyWriter) instead
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    io.helidon.config.encryption.MpEncryptionFilter()
    io.helidon.config.hocon.HoconConfigParser()
    Use HoconConfigParser.builder() to construct a customized instance, or HoconConfigParser.create() to get an instance with defaults
    io.helidon.config.yaml.YamlConfigParser()
    This method should not be directly used, use YamlConfigParser.create()
    io.helidon.integrations.cdi.eclipselink.CDISEPlatformExtension()
    Only a CDI container should invoke this constructor.
    io.helidon.webserver.ExperimentalConfiguration.Builder()
    use ExperimentalConfiguration.builder() instead.
